name: Pear Tree
description:
Just like the raven pear tree that produces large quantities of juicy, sweet fruit, you too are a generous person who never tires of giving. You are a hard worker. 

Resilience characterises you, you are a strong person and you are unlikely to be knocked down by adversity. 

Your secret to completing your life projects is the constant care and love you put into everything you do!

name: Chestnut Tree
description:
The chestnut tree has for centuries provided a precious and nutritious fruit, the chestnut, which has played an important role in the history and culture of the Piedmont region. 

You are a person who has a lot to give, who puts others before yourself and this generosity comes back to you because you are a person who leaves your mark on the lives of others. 

You are always remembered for your elegant and sophisticated personality

name: Hazelnut Tree
description:
You are a sweet person, just like the hazelnuts the tree gives each year and which are then used in the confectionery market. 

You are attached to family and traditions. You have a tenacious, determined and resilient personality that does not give up easily when faced with difficulties, just like the hazelnut tree that plays an important role in food production and the ecosystem in which it lives.

name: Checker Tree
description:
Your personality is sweet, generous and affectionate, able to give pleasure and satisfaction to others, just like the fragrant flowers and high-quality honey you can obtain from them. 

You are a stable and self-confident person able to face life's challenges with strength and determination.

name: Black Alder
description:
You are a high achiever and passionate which forces people to look up to you. You are often charming and easily relate with a broad mix of personalities. 

You are confident and have a drive to achieve more, always willing to find solutions and work for what you want. When it comes to work you never miss a deadline. You also have a sweet tooth.

name: Silver Fir Tree
description:
You and the Silver Fir are a perfect match with your willpower and grit. You are able to endure and fight through challenges. You are optimistic and always encourages & supports your close ones. 

You never give up regardless of the obstacles. You are an imaginative and strategic thinker with a plan for everything. You are a bold and strong-willed leader. 

When it comes to unwinding, you prefer a peaceful cold evening curled up with a good book in a cozy corner. Silver Firs can be the symbol of appreciation as they are the tree of choice for live Christmas trees and often bring families together during the holiday season.

name: Silver Fir Tree
description:

When it comes to unwinding, you prefer a peaceful cold evening curled up with a good book in a cozy corner. Silver Firs can be the symbol of appreciation as they are the tree of choice for live Christmas trees and often bring families together during the holiday season.

name: Wild Cherry Tree
description:
You are a delicate and harmonious person with great inner and outer beauty, just like the spectacular blossoming of this tree with white and pink flowers. 

You are a generous person who takes pleasure in sharing joy with everyone around you.

name: Frassin Tree
description:
You are a dynamic, vital and renewing person just like the Ash tree associated with the energy of growth and rebirth because new trees can sprout from its fruit. 

Your personality is balanced, you prefer to think things through before acting in order to do the right thing.

name: White Willow
description:
You are flexible and adaptable, able to bend and resist adversity without breaking. 

You prefer quiet and protected environments, but at the same time you are able to adapt to different situations and are able to cope with life's difficulties. 

You are a thoughtful and deep personality, able to find peace and inner balance even in the most complex situations.

name: Wild Apple Tree
description:
You are a full of life, generous and altruistic person who tries to give your neighbour everything you own, like wild apple tree with its fruit. 

You are a creative person, capable of seeking new solutions and exploiting the resources in the environment to grow.

name: Holm Oak Tree
description:
You are a solid and reliable person, offering support and protection to the people you love. 

For the ancient Romans it was considered a sacred tree; you are a deep and reflective person, who seeks to find deeper meaning in life and to connect with something greater than oneself.

name: Birch Tree
description:
Just like the birch tree that survives in harsh climates and on infertile soil, you too are a strong and persevering person.

You are able to overcome life's challenges and have the great ability to adapt to difficult situations. Don't be surprised if in your group of friends you are the one sought out to dispense advice! 

You are a knowledgeable person who always knows what to say at the right time without ever lacking your delicate elegance.

name: White Poplar Tree
description: You are a sensitive and delicate person who responds to changes quickly and with a spirit of adaptation; your only belief is freedom and lightness of life. Just like the foliage of the white poplar tree when it moves with the wind.

name: Oak Tree
description:
You are a strong and wise person who inspires respect and trust, able to provide solid and reliable support to the people around you. 

You are patient and every moment is good to learn, to share your knowledge with others and to pass on the values of tradition.

name: Oak Tree
description:
You are a strong and wise person who inspires respect and trust, able to provide solid and reliable support to the people around you. 

You are patient and every moment is good to learn, to share your knowledge with others and to pass on the values of tradition.

name: Rowan
description:
Your personality is joyful and lively, able to enlighten the world around you with its presence like the red fruits that characterise the tree. 

Your personality is resilient and capable of overcoming life's difficulties just like the tree that lives in harsh conditions, in the mountains, and has to fight against the weather and climate difficulties. 

You are a charming person capable of attracting and protecting others.

description:

You are a charming person capable of attracting and protecting others.

name: Larch Tree
description: You are an elegant and regal person, capable of defying everyday problems with pride, just like the imposing and majestic broad foliage of the Larch tree.

name: Larch Tree
description: You are an elegant and regal person, capable of defying everyday problems with pride, just like the imposing and majestic broad foliage of the Larch tree.

name: Yew Tree
description:
You are a person with great inner strength who is able to adapt to the challenges of time. You have a stable and resilient personality like the Yew Tree that can live for hundreds of years.

Yours is an elusive and mysterious personality, able to protect itself from external threats just like the bark of the Yew tree that is smooth and grey, but its leaves and fruit are toxic.

name: Yew Tree
description:

name: Hop Hornbeam Tree
description: You are a strong and resilient person who knows how to withstand the storms of life, but at the same time you can flexibly adapt to the challenges you may encounter in your environment, without ever losing sight of yourself.

name: Hop Hornbeam Tree
description: You are a strong and resilient person who knows how to withstand the storms of life, but at the same time you can flexibly adapt to the challenges you may encounter in your environment, without ever losing sight of yourself.

name: Flowering Ash
description:
You are a quiet but at the same time tenacious person, you adapt to difficult situations without losing yourself. 

You are a person who offers protection and security to others but does not seek visibility or attention in an intrusive manner because everything that you do, you do it for the pleasure of helping others.

name: Turkey Oak
description:
You are a protective and generous person, like the acorns of this tree that represent a source of nourishment for wildlife. 

You are patient and persevering who does not let difficulties discourage you and strives to achieve your long-term goals. 

You enjoy collaborating in groups by including and building positive relationships to work together with others to achieve a common goal.

name: Hazelnut Tree
description:
You are a sweet person, just like the hazelnuts the tree gives each year and which are then used in the confectionery market. You are attached to family and traditions. 

You have a tenacious, determined and resilient personality that does not give up easily when faced with difficulties, just like the hazelnut tree that plays an important role in food production and the ecosystem in which it lives.

name: Maple Tree
description:
You have a lot in common with the maple tree than you think. You are free spirited and open minded. You are vibrant and you get along with everybody, everybody loves to hang around with you. 

You have a wide imagination and is ambitious but can also be shy and reserved. You crave new experiences and love creating memories.You are an extrovert and lover of animals.

name: Pedunculate Oak
description:
You are a delicate and elegant person, like the leaves of the Farnia tree that conjure up an image of beauty and harmony. 

You have a sensitive and refined personality, capable of appreciating and creating beauty around you. You love open, bright spaces just like this tree. You love nature and protect the environment while preserving its beauty and richness.
